---
title: 'Picture'
---

import { Picture } from '@lib/components/Picture';

## Usage

```jsx
import { Picture } from '@dodo/ui/components';

<Picture image={{ src: 'https://placehold.co/280x280' }}/>
```

## Default

<div class="not-content">
	<Picture image={{ src: 'https://placehold.co/280x280' }}/>
</div>

```jsx
<Picture image={{ src: 'https://placehold.co/280x280' }}/>
```

## With metaData

Additional metaData can be passed to the image prop. This is used to generate a low quality image placeholder (lqip) and to provide the aspect ratio of the image.

<div class="not-content">
	<Picture image={{
		src: 'https://placehold.co/280x280',
		metaData: {
			lqip: 'data:image/png;base64,',
			dimensions: {
				aspectRatio: 1,
				width: 280,
				height: 280
			}
		}
	}}/>
</div>

```jsx
<Picture image={{
		src: 'https://placehold.co/280x280',
		metaData: {
			lqip: '', // base64 encoded image
			dimensions: {
				aspectRatio: 1,
				width: 280,
				height: 280
			}
		}
	}}/>
```
